name: Crash Land Crystal
description:
Space adventurer / part-time mechanic Crystal has crash landed on Planet Unknown: a colorful, crystalline planet full of surprises and unknown dangers.

Your ship is in dire need of attention and energy from the planet's most powerful fuel: Crystals! Automate your way to success by building out a squad of bots or brave the wilds of the Wilted Woods, Spiny Desert, and Mountain Isle to find them yourself. 

Do whatever it takes to repair your ship and escape Planet Unknown!

A collaboration between Chris Wade, Taylor Gates, Karley Karensky, Brieyh'leai, Nic Lupfer, and Tom Dunkin

Controller:

  • A - Jump
  • X - Whack
  • Y - Interact

Mouse/Keyboard:

  • Spacebar - Jump
  • LMB - Whack
  • E - Interact
